    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78953</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Function of the nitrile functional group in organic synthesis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion der Nitrilfunktionsgruppe in der 
organischen Synthese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonction du groupe fonctionnel de nitriles dans 
la synthèse organique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Função do grupo funcional do nitrile na 
síntese orgânica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzione del gruppo funzionale del nitrile nella 
sintesi organica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειτουργία της λειτουργικής ομάδας νιτριλίων στην 
οργανική σύνθεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Función del grupo funcional del nitrile en 
síntesis orgánica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the nitrile functional group is used in the polymerisation of ethenenitrile to produce polyethenenitrile (also called polyacrylonitrile).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ethenenitrile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrile functional group</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">organic synthesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polyacrylonitrile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polyethenenitrile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polymerisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die 
Nitrilfunktionsgruppe in der Polymerisierung von ethenenitrile benutzt
wird, um polyethenenitrile zu produzieren (polyacrylonitrile auch 
benannt).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le groupe 
fonctionnel de nitriles est employé dans la polymérisation 
d'ethenenitrile pour produire polyethenenitrile (également appelé 
polyacrylonitrile).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o grupo funcional 
do nitrile é usado na polimerização de ethenenitrile produzir 
polyethenenitrile (chamado também polyacrylonitrile).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come il gruppo 
funzionale del nitrile è usato nella polimerizzazione di 
ethenenitrile per produrre polyethenenitrile (anche chiamato 
polyacrylonitrile).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η λειτουργική 
ομάδα νιτριλίων χρησιμοποιείται στον πολυμερισμό ethenenitrile 
για να παραγάγει polyethenenitrile (επίσης αποκαλούμενος 
polyacrylonitrile).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el grupo 
funcional del nitrile se utiliza en la polimerización de 
ethenenitrile para producir polyethenenitrile (también llamado 
polyacrylonitrile).</string>
          </description>
